changeSet.sql: DO ' DECLARE BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''${tenantname}_mod_configuration'' AND table_name = ''config_data'') THEN INSERT INTO ${tenantname}_mod_data_export_spring.export_config ( id, config_name, type, tenant, export_type_specific_parameters, schedule_frequency, schedule_period, schedule_time, week_days, created_date, created_by, updated_date, updated_by ) SELECT C.id::uuid, C.jsonb->>''configName'', value_jsonb->>''type'', value_jsonb->>''tenant'', value_jsonb->''exportTypeSpecificParameters'', (value_jsonb->>''scheduleFrequency'')::integer, value_jsonb->>''schedulePeriod'', value_jsonb->>''scheduleTime'', value_jsonb->''weekDays'', (C.jsonb->''metadata''->>''createdDate'')::timestamp, (C.jsonb->''metadata''->>''createdByUserId'')::uuid, (C.jsonb->''metadata''->>''updatedDate'')::timestamp, (C.jsonb->''metadata''->>''updatedByUserId'')::uuid FROM ${tenantname}_mod_configuration.config_data C CROSS JOIN LATERAL (SELECT C.jsonb->''value'' AS value_jsonb) v WHERE C.jsonb->>''module'' = ''mod-data-export-spring'' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ${tenantname}_mod_data_export_spring.export_config EC WHERE EC.config_name = C.jsonb->>''configName'' ) ON CONFLICT (id) DO NOTHING; END IF; END; ' LANGUAGE plpgsql;
